title: Wanting to make a 5v5 team
body:
Hey Everyone,

I have recently started playing League of legends again after having a year break and am looking for people to be in a team with. I am currently in Silver V but I don't care what rank you are, just want people who are nice, dont rage quit or get too angry in game and people with skype. all positions available, I main adc and support but can play where ever. add me on league : punchybrah and shoot me a message ragarding this post. if you have a team and are looking for people also please add me and message me because I dont mind joining a team.

replies.body: Hey man ADC/supp main but can also Jung pretty well
I can fill any role but adc is my least fav ^.^ add me
ADD ME :) mid/support main but can play anywhere gold 5 atm add so we can discuss further if needed :)
Hey, I might be on for a game this afternoon and will add you, if not I will be on thrusday due to going away tomorrow.
I wouldn't mind Joining, i play Top,jg or support. I am Currently in Gold 5
Hey, I might be on for a game this afternoon and will add you, if not I will be on thrusday due to going away tomorrow.
I main support so im in, love to be apart of the team
absolutley, ill add you when I get home.
glad to be apart of it
mid lane and adc main. Interested. :)
hit me up. jungle main. gold 4
Will do, Ill be home in an hour. keen to team up tonight?

add me aswell? I main support but can fill at silver level :)
IGN: FrostLife ShaS

I'm down, bronze 3 in solo Q (Gold 3 in ranked 5s)
I main support and can play just about all supps. Extensive knowledge of 5s.
Add me if you want. Prepared to be committed.
Kind regards
-Traloop
Sounds great! I will add you when i get home in an hour and am keen to team up in norms this arvo!
